title: Apache Down Over 10%, On Pace for Largest Percent Decrease Since January 2016 — Data Talk
text:
Apache Corporation (APA) is currently at $20.72, down $2.51 or 10.8%

-- Would be lowest close since Oct. 10, 2019, when it closed at $20.43

-- On pace for largest percent decrease since Jan. 6, 2016, when it fell 11.49%

-- Currently down two consecutive days; down 11.98% over this period

-- Worst two day stretch since the two days ending Jan. 7, 2016, when it fell 16.03%

-- Down 19.06% month-to-date; on pace for worst month since May 2019, when it fell 20.78%

-- Down 21.07% year-to-date

-- Down 85.89% from its all-time closing high of $146.80 on May 20, 2008

-- Down 44.58% from 52 weeks ago (Oct. 26, 2018), when it closed at $37.39

-- Down 45.23% from its 52 week closing high of $37.83 on Oct. 31, 2018

-- Up 3.96% from its 52 week closing low of $19.93 on Aug. 15, 2019

-- Traded as low as $20.57; lowest intraday level since Oct. 10, 2019, when it hit $20.27

-- Down 11.45% at today's intraday low; largest intraday percent decrease since Jan. 6, 2016, when it fell as much as 11.67%

-- Worst performer in the S&P 500 today

-- Seventh most active stock in the S&P 500 today

All data as of 10:24:43 AM

Source: Dow Jones Market Data, FactSet

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 25, 2019 10:44 ET (14:44 GMT)
